about_the_game:
Don't want to grind? Get all Halloween 2020 decorations for a slight bargain with this DLC!

Included Items:
- Vintage Register
- Mysterious Cat Clock (Animated)
- Halloween Stickers
- Pumpkin Pot
- Lazy Bone Bud (Animated)
- Neon Brain (Animated)
- Eye Pad (Animated)
- Nightmare Box

**PLEASE NOTE: If you already own any item from the list, purchasing this DLC will not provide you an extra set/ duplicate nor be discounted off of the final price. You will only receive the items you have yet to obtain.

  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: A pizza shop simulator decked out in time for Halloween! Are you ready to serve as a party chef in Dracula's castle? Prepare a bite, or be bitten..
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, Spanish - Spain*, Japanese*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, German*, Korean*, Traditional Chinese*, Polish*, Turkish*, Spanish - Latin America*, Arabic*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Indonesian*
*languages with full audio support
